Name: The Clot Thickens
About the game: INFECTIOUS PUZZLES. ARCADE ACTION Play as the bacteria Over 200 challenging levels Infect over 1000 shrinking, moving, and spiked cells Maneuver carefully past threats Customize your appearance Easy to learn, hard to master Unique gravity platformer Designed for hardcore puzzle solvers - Skill & brains required! Created by award-winning console and indie game developers, The Clot Thickens hides infectiously unique and challenging platform puzzle design!
